MeCard.title: Nathan Bonnell
MeCard.citation: “The only way to do great work is to love what you do.” — Steve Jobs
MeCard.description: Computer science student at Ynov Campus in Bordeaux. I am passionate about full-stack web development and exploring various technologies. I create innovative and high-performing solutions that blend creativity, efficiency, and technical expertise. I have had the opportunity to carry out several projects of all kinds, ranging from simple web pages to more complex applications, including game servers.
MeCard.born: I was born on {date} in Paris. I lived in Paris for 3 years before moving to Bordeaux where I currently live.
MeCard.WIPMessage: This widget is a work in progress. Thank you for your understanding.

1.title: Full Stack Developer (apprenticeship)
1.description: Development of websites for the firm's clients.

2.title: Master's in Computer Science
2.description: Development of web, mobile, and software applications (also learning infrastructure and network technologies).
